name: gymnastically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is similar to gymnastics (= physical exercises and activities performed inside, often using equipment such as bars and ropes, intended to increase the body's strength and the ability to move and bend easily): His daughter is gymnastically talented and can do a handstand for over a minute. The cheerleading routine requires the team to perform some gymnastically challenging moves. Related words
gymnastic
gymnastics
More examplesFewer examplesThe squirrel was balanced gymnastically on top of the telephone wire, and then leapt from there to a nearby tree.
